content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The main target image shows two separate structures:

1. **Tower Structure (Right)**: A tall construction with 3 layers
   - Bottom layer: Red block with a circular hole, placed on a yellow rectangular base
   - Middle layer: Two green vertical pillars connected by a yellow horizontal beam
   - Top layer: An orange triangular prism on top of a yellow rectangular beam

2. **Small Structure (Left)**: A smaller construction with 3 layers
   - Bottom layer: Yellow rectangular base with a red block with a semicircular cutout
   - Middle layer: Green rectangular block
   - Top layer: Two blue cubes side by side
   - Additional element: An orange triangular prism leaning against the structure

## Spatial Relationships
- The tower structure is taller and more complex
- The smaller structure appears to be positioned to the left of the tower
- Both structures use similar colored blocks but in different arrangements

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:

- Block 1: Red block with archway (for bottom of tower)
- Block 2: Red block with semicircular cutout (for bottom of small structure)
- Block 4: Blue cube (used twice for top of small structure)
- Block 5: Orange cube (not used - I was mistaken earlier)
- Block 6: Green horizontal rectangular block (for middle of small structure)
- Block 7: Green vertical pillar (used twice for middle layer of tower)
- Block 8: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (for base of tower and connecting beam in middle layer)
- Block 9: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (for base of small structure)
- Block 10 or 11: Yellow vertical rectangular block (not clearly needed from this view)
- Block 14: Orange triangular prism (for top of tower)
- Block 15: Orange triangular prism (leaning against small structure)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 9 (Yellow horizontal base for small structure)
    Step2: Move block with index 2 (Red block with semicircular cutout on base)
    Step3: Move block with index 6 (Green horizontal block on red block)
    Step4: Move block with index 4 (Blue cube on left side of green block)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (Blue cube on right side of green block)
    Step6: Move block with index 15 (Orange triangular prism leaning against structure)
    Step7: Move block with index 8 (Yellow horizontal base for tower)
    Step8: Move block with index 1 (Red block with circular hole on base)
    Step9: Move block with index 8 (Yellow horizontal beam above red block)
    Step10: Move block with index 7 (Green vertical pillar on left side)
    Step11: Move block with index 7 (Green vertical pillar on right side)
    Step12: Move block with index 8 (Yellow horizontal beam on top of pillars)
    Step13: Move block with index 14 (Orange triangular prism on top beam)
}
```
